column4: I'm trying to access a ext3 partition ,sda3 the home partition for my gutsy, from 6.06lts . Disks Manager says in accessible. It shouldn't matter this ext3 was created in gutsy should it?
Do 6.06 and 7.10 treat ext3 partitions differently? I'm trying to access 7.10's home folder from 6.06
you need a guru for a file system? I thoughtthat was self-explanitory
